library(sf)

som_adm0_levels <- c(

  "som_admbnda_adm1_ocha_20230308",
  "som_admbnda_adm2_ocha_20230308"

  set_names(c("adm0", "adm1", "adm2"))

r_fs <- fs_to_raster(fs_obj = tnc_fs_filt,band = "SFED_AREA")
